author: djames
msg: * build/generator/gen_base.py (query_swig): Typo fix. Followup to r17425.

author: maxb
msg: Followup to r17396. Fix release mode, after r17396 broke it by tickling a bug
Move dependencies which do not matter to the generation of SWIG source, only to
the compilation of it, to actually be attached to the compilation, not the
generation, rule. This is required because some of the files which matter only
at compilation might not even exist at generation time.
Receive two different kinds of dependencies from the IncludeDependencyInfo
instance, registering one kind as DT_OBJECT (.o: .c) dependencies, the
Fill in SWIG proxy info earlier, thus fixing bugs where this info was not
Changes to reflect that includes now have a type (C or SWIG).
Run closure across all dependencies, not just those which are existing
Extended with dependency type (C or SWIG) handling.
(IncludeDependencyInfo.query): New wrapper emulating the old behaviour for

author: lundblad
msg: On wc-propcaching branch: INtroduce an has_props flag in the entry, which
tracks whether the entry has any working props.  Use this flag to avoid lots
of stat calls in svn status.
(svn_wc__load_props): Make use of the has_props flag to not try to load

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r17289, fix bad merge.
I hang my head in shame, in r17289, when I merged r16234:17095 from
svn/trunk to ebcdic/trunk, I *somehow* screwed up this file.  This applies
the merge changes from 16234:17095 that didn't make it in and applies the
required fixes for the AS/400 port.
(FALSE_STR, NONE_STR, TRUE_STR, UNKNOWN_STR): New utf-8 escaped
SVN_WC__LOG_ATTR_ARG_5): Hex escape symbolic constant with utf-8 values.
(svn_wc__logfile_path): Use APR_PSPRINTF2 to create all utf-8 log
(svn_wc__loggy_committed): Use APR_PSPRINTF2 to create all utf-8 xml tag.
(svn_wc__loggy_entry_modify): Use new utf-8 symbols in place of string
literals.  Use APR_PRSPRINTF2 when creating string reps of rev numbers.
(svn_wc__write_log): Use APR_PSPRINTF to create ebcdic string for SVN_ERR_W.

author: pburba
